shortdesc.ph: Enables/Disables the audio playback route to the speakerphone.
Enables/Disables the audio playback route to the speakerphone.

section.p: This method sets whether the audio is routed to the speakerphone or earpiece. This method sets whether the audio is routed to the speakerphone or earpiece. After a successful method call, the SDK triggers the callback. After calling this method, the SDK will return a callback to indicate that the status has changed.

在 Android 上， 中 scenario 及 的设置会影响 的行为。 On Android, the settings of scenario and will affect the behavior of. 不生效的情况如下： The non-effective circumstances are as follows:
当 scenario 为 时，所有用户都无法切换音频路由。 When scenario is, all users cannot switch audio routing.
If you set `scenario` as `AUDIO_SCENARIO_DEFAULT` or `AUDIO_SCENARIO_SHOWROOM`, the audience cannot change the audio playback route. If there is only one broadcaster is in the channel, the broadcaster cannot change the audio playback route either. If you set `scenario` as `AUDIO_SCENARIO_DEFAULT` or `AUDIO_SCENARIO_SHOWROOM`, the audience cannot change the audio playback route. If there is only one broadcaster is in the channel, the broadcaster cannot change the audio playback route either.
If you set `scenario` as `AUDIO_SCENARIO_EDUCATION`, the audience cannot change the audio playback route. If you set `scenario` as `AUDIO_SCENARIO_EDUCATION`, the audience cannot change the audio playback route.

ul.li: This method is for Android and iOS only. This method is for Android and iOS only.
Ensure that you call to create a data channel before calling this method. Please make sure that the method has been called before calling this method.

plentry.pd:
This method sets whether the audio is routed to the speakerphone or earpiece. This method sets whether the audio is routed to the speakerphone or earpiece.
true: Route the audio to the speakerphone. true: Route the audio to the speakerphone. If the playback device connects to the earpiece or Bluetooth, the audio cannot be routed to the speakerphone. If the playback device connects to the earpiece or Bluetooth, the audio cannot be routed to the speakerphone.
false: Route the audio to the earpiece. false: Route the audio to the earpiece. If a headset is plugged in, the audio is routed to the headset. If a headset is plugged in, the audio is routed to the headset.
